**As an** analyst and/or developer
**I need** to derive insights from data  
**So that** we can make informed business decisions  

**Assumptions:** 
* Data is available and accessible.
* Analytical tools are set up and ready to use.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Task 1
- [ ] Task 2
- [ ] Task 3
